data.title: The Daily Bridge
data.meta_description:
'The Daily Bridge': 365 More Meditations on Music' is the third book in a several part series. The idea is to take thought-provoking, meaningful, and purpose-filled musical quotes said by other people and provide insightful commentary on them to apply to every day life. 

Designed to read and meditate on one page a day for an entire year, it's simple and easy to add this to your daily routine. Or, if you want to read all of them at once, you can do so as well. Feel free to jump around the pages and explore at your liking!
data.text:
'The Daily Bridge': 365 More Meditations on Music' is the third book in a several part series. The idea is to take thought-provoking, meaningful, and purpose-filled musical quotes said by other people and provide insightful commentary on them to apply to every day life. Designed to read and meditate on one page a day for an entire year, it's simple and easy to add this to your daily routine. Or, if you want to read all of them at once, you can do so as well. Feel free to jump around the pages and explore at your liking!
